title: A Day in the Death of Joe Egg (The Handicapped Person in The
brief_description: Film content is scenes from the play “A Day In The Death of Joe Egg” by Peter Nichols. It provides an extremely rich and provocative learning resource in which the actors role-play sketches within the play to caricature situations faced by parents of a handicapped child Cast includes Romona Kaye, Harriet Buchan, Jack Shepherd.
